text: The 1986/87 NTFL season was the 66th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). St Marys have won there 14th premiership title while defeating the Darwin Buffaloes in the grand final by 121 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | St Marys | 26.14 (170) - 7.7 (49) | Darwin |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1986–87 NTFL season
